General.Name: Wilmington Capital Management Inc
General.Description: Wilmington Capital Management Inc. is a private equity firm specializing in special situation investments. The firm prefers to invest in real estate and energy sectors. It owns and operates 38 self-storage facilities with approximately 1.6 million square feet of rentable area in British Columbia, Alberta, Manitoba, and Ontario. In addition, it owns and operates 4 marinas in Ontario, which include approximately 1,700 boat slips and 100 acres of waterfront land. The company was formerly known as Unicorp Inc. and changed its name to Wilmington Capital Management Inc. in March 2002. Wilmington Capital Management Inc. was founded in 1979 and is based in Calgary, Canada with an additional office in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 505-3rd Street SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3E6
